name: Soccer Run (Neutron Games)
description:
This is a 36 hours Jam Game. Jam's theme was 

There are 3 balls in the game, each with a different point value. Seeing a red card, entering the red portal and losing the ball to the defender reduces your number of balls and score.

The puzzle part of the game is provided on blue portals. Although there are 4 different puzzles, your final score will be increased by 4 times if you solve these puzzles.

As a fun element, the voices of several famous football players have been added to the game.

4 free assets, including 1 character and 3 balls, were used in the game and modified.
